articles.description: Mathias Pogba has hit back at his 'money-grabbing' brother Paul, accusing him of 'witchcraft' and putting the family in danger - before claiming reports about an £11million extortion are false.
articles.content:
Mathias Pogba has hit back at his 'money-grabbing' brother Paul, accusing him of 'witchcraft' and putting the family in danger - before claiming reports about an £11million extortion are false.
